RSA and Big Integer Class

Class biginteger

   in biginteger.h
   in biginteger.cpp
class biginteger

A class that represents integer with unrestrained size.

Since:
2017-13-07

abs

public biginteger abs() const;
Calculate |this|.

gcd

public static biginteger gcd( biginteger a, biginteger b );
Calculate greatest common divisor with Euclidean Algorithm.
Parameters:
a - The first integer.
b - The second integer.
Returns:
gcd(a,b).

gcdExtended

public static biginteger gcdExtended( biginteger a, biginteger b, biginteger& x, biginteger& y );
Calculate greatest common divisor and solve Bézout's Identity with Extended Euclidean Algorithm. The Bézout's Identity is: a*x + b*y = gcd(a,b).
Parameters:
a - The first integer.
b - The second integer.
x - The first coefficient.
y - The second coefficient.
Returns:
gcd(a,b), update x and y value.
